Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the poets cry themselves to sleep, and all their tearful words will turn back into steam

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: We must memorize nine numbers and deny we have a soul

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: When you look at what people consider success in the music industry, it's just terrible music

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that vinyl will outlast CDs

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: We've all seen the power music has to spread messages of solidarity and hope

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Dad, wherever you are, you are gone but you will never be forgotten

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Contrast is what makes photography interesting

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Every cinematographer I worked with had his own way of solving problems

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinematography is infinite in its possibilities... much more so than music or language

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw Tequila Sunrise as a romantic picture with complex, bigger than life characters

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I realize that every picture isn't a work of art

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: My first semester, I got a D in creative writing

Quote.Author: Conrad Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very happy sitting alone at a dining room table, writing a script

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Women, if the soul of the nation is to be saved, I believe that you must become its soul

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Scandal sells books; fidelity does not

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Non-violence is a permanent attitude we bring to the breakfast table and bring to bed at night

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Nonviolence is the only credible response to the violence we're seeing around the world

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Revenge and retaliation always perpetuate the cycle of anger, fear and violence

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: If you use weapons of war to bring about peace, you're going to have more war and destruction

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have people who prick the consciences of the nation

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: Like Gandhi, my husband had struggled with the issue of materialism

Quote.Author: Coretta Scott King
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that women know if their husbands are unfaithful. They feel it

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't have a physical transformation until you have a spiritual transformation

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage equality is not a choice. It is a legal right

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be myself. I want to be as authentic as possible

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: Our platform is crafted by Democrats but it is not about partisanship, its about pragmatism

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: Hopelessness is a really toxic and dangerous state

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: Our platform emphasizes that a vibrant, free and fair market is essential to economic growth

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: People are always trying to draw simplistic dialectics that can capture things

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a geek nerd who happened to have a temporary period of jockiness

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd gladly take a grenade, if it meant saving Newark

Quote.Author: Cory Booker
Quote.QuoteValue: I debated between law school and divinity

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't disrespect people for having a different opinion

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people need to be treated with respect, and that's what we've demanded from everyone

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: We got to protect Medicaid

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned to listen. I don't get everything right the first time

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Besides the conventional military threats, North Korean cyber capabilities are growing

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Any proposal that allows people who are here illegally to cut to the front of the line is amnesty

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get everything right the first time

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: What can we do to put more Colorado in Washington and less Washington in Colorado?

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as a federal personhood bill

Quote.Author: Cory Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Sen. Udall can only talk about one thing: He's a social issues warrior

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to feel I'm responsible for anorexia across the country

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a gemini, and I get so bored so easily. I mean, I have moved six times in the last eight years

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: Always a godmother, never a mother. That sucks. I've got to get me one of those little accessories

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't find the whole 'cougar' word that offensive

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of all over the place, and I need grounding

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd feel better about myself if I did stomach crunches, but I don't

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be calm

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no doubt that motherhood is the best thing in my life. It's all that really matters

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of times people say, 'As soon as you relax you'll have a kid.'

Quote.Author: Courteney Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, actually, plucking my eyebrows is more of a hobby than a grooming tip

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I want every girl in the world to pick up a guitar and start screaming

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I like all the angels around because they protect me and my daughter. I mean, her Dad's an angel

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: Warren Beatty took an interest in my career at one point

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to write on your own and produce your own life

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a woman. I'm a force of nature

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: In rock stardom there's an absolute economic upside to self-destruction

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always prefer to play with women and hang out with women, and I'll always be a feminist

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a rock widow is not my job, so I would hire people to do it for me

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a rock star is like being a cult leader - you really have to be in your own religion

Quote.Author: Courtney Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mean to be a diva, but some days you wake up and you're Barbara Streisand

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very interesting to know what people are doing while you're working on late-night television

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think comedy comes more from a low sense of self-esteem, and I certainly have that

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: If Scotland and America go to war, I'm afraid I've already sworn in

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: I proved to my own satisfaction that I am madder than I think

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: Other than the laws of physics, rules have never really worked out for me

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't ever rope me in as a late-night talk show host. I don't want to be one

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not aware of having a creepy laugh, but apparently I do

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: I aim to please. I'm nothing if not a vaudevillian

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know now if I'm funny. I just keep talking and hope that I hit something that's funny

Quote.Author: Craig Ferguson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to do a show which is of interest to me, or else I'm lost

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: My brother asked me once, 'Are you a misanthrope?' And I said, 'No, I just find people irritating.'

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: I think mankind is overly sensitive, very needy, greedy, and flawed

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to miss my best friends - my cameras

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a wonderful respect for old people

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought late-night was crowded... the format's repetitive

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned at an early age that using the third person will push some buttons

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoyed retirement the right way... linguine con vongole, red wine and plenty of truffle cheese

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's fun being creative and that's satisfying

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: I lived in a studio apartment until my mid-30s. I don't have an extravagant lifestyle

Quote.Author: Craig Kilborn
Quote.QuoteValue: CBS was very generous in their offer to re-sign me. But I simply want to try something new

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: I will never give up, and I will never give in

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: I will live my life full of love and full of fun. It's the only way I know how

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: The way you think influences the way you feel, and the way you feel determines how you act

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: Sports are supposed to be fun, and so I have fun with the way I dress

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: Something that I've always been. Always lively. I don't want to be dull

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: Sports are in my soul. That's what drives me

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: If I missed a game, that meant I was losing the battle. I'm not going to let leukemia affect me

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fighting cancer and I refuse to give up

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: Ya gotta think positive

Quote.Author: Craig Sager
Quote.QuoteValue: I will continue to keep fighting sucking the marrow out of life as life sucks the marrow out of me

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: A doctor can save maybe a few hundred lives in a lifetime. A researcher can save the whole world

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: The future of society is 100% dependent on scientific advances

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: I have this idea of trying to catalog all the genes on the planet

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: The only 'afterlife' is what other people remember of you

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: We can create new ways to create clean water

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: Mitochondrial DNA is in higher concentration, lasts longer, and can be extracted from bones

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: Genes can't possibly explain all of what makes us what we are

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not sure our brains and our psychologies are ready for immortality

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: As a scientist, I clearly see the potential for harnessing the power of nature

Quote.Author: Craig Venter
Quote.QuoteValue: We're moving from reading the genetic code to writing it

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent without working hard is nothing

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like being alone

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: I have my flaws too, but I am a professional who doesn't like to miss or lose

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm aware that, whatever the circumstances, there will always be speculation about me

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes the best training is to rest

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm living a dream I never want to wake up from

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind people hating me, because it pushes me

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: Why lie? I'm not going to be a hypocrite and say the opposite of what I think, like some others do

Quote.Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not the humblest person in the world. I admit that

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandmother, she's been the positive portion of my life the entire time

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Just be confident. I think confidence is the most attractive part of a person

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you've been in life-threatening situations, you become aware that life is not for ever

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama is for same-sex marriage. If the president is saying that, then who am I to go the other way?

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a romantic side

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'll be going to Heaven, because I had good intentions. But my actions are another thing

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I started hustling at 12, my mother hustled ahead of me. I was only allowed to because they knew me

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: People who actually have money don't want to talk about it. They want to talk about everything else

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's Fifty, not Fiddy

Quote.Author: Curtis Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: In my neighborhood... they view the police as someone who comes to take their loved ones away

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: Graffiti is usually a protest - ink on walls - or has a reason for being naughty or aggressive

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: It's absurd to talk about paintings that you haven't finished

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: I was brought up to think you don't talk about yourself

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: I swear if I had to do this over again, I would just do the paintings and never show them

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an abstractionist completely

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: The Mediterranean is always just white, white, white

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work 9 to 5

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: To my mind, one does not put oneself in place of the past; one only adds a new link

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: I have my pace and way of living, and I'm not looking for something

Quote.Author: Cy Twombly
Quote.QuoteValue: I would've liked to have been Poussin, if I'd had a choice, in another time

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything does go in a circle

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: You can laugh when I talk, but not when I sing

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I've been playing with my hair color ever since I was nine

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: God has more important things to worry about than who I sleep with

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: I absolutely refuse to reveal my age. What am I - a car?

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: I lucked out when I started to sing. I'd already experienced failing at everything else

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always felt, even as a songwriter, that the rhythm of speech is in itself a language for me

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not gonna worry about what people think about me. I'm too busy. I don't give a hoot

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't judge the way other people behave. I can only look at myself

Quote.Author: Cyndi Lauper
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother said I was a little odd as a kid. I was alone a lot, but I didn't feel alone

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Purity engenders Wisdom, Passion avarice, and Ignorance folly, infatuation and darkness

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Vulgarity is the garlic in the salad of life

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: The past is the only dead thing that smells sweet

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: It is only in the country that we can get to know a person or a book

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: The dread of lonliness is greater than the fear of bondage, so we get married

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: We love but once, for once only are we perfectly equipped for loving

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: The true index of a man's character is the health of his wife

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: No city should be too large for a man to walk out of in a morning

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Idleness is only a coarse name for my infinite capacity for living in the present

Quote.Author: Cyril Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Better to write for yourself and have no public, than to write for the public and have no self

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: Technological discoveries are the spermatozoa of social change

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: All the world has been converted and Washington is the modem Mecca

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: The country has undergone a profound social upheaval, the greatest the proletariat has ever known

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: All peoples are entangled in the net of the world market

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: Imperialist enterprise draws political consequences

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: As the class struggle sharpens in the U.S. Marxism will come into its own as a great popular study

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, Bolshevism represents revolution and the revolutionary struggle

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: I may as well say it, I have been married three times

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not only that Germany has been defeated in the war, Kaiser Wilhelm's Germany was defeated

Quote.Author: C. L. R. James
Quote.QuoteValue: I must say the idea of a United Africa was nonsense

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The chief product of an automated society is a widespread and deepening sense of boredom

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to be a has-been than a never-was

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics people give you what they think you deserve and deny you what they think you want

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Delay is the deadliest form of denial

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Expansion means complexity and complexity decay

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The smaller the function, the greater the management

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Expenditures rise to meet income

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Make the people sovereign and the poor will use the machinery of government to dispossess the rich

Quote.Author: C. Northcote Parkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfection of planned layout is achieved only by institutions on the point of collapse

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I do wish my breasts were bigger. Not big... but less small

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I am who I am. I'm not going to change for anybody

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been doing a lot of hiking, which I love

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a couple of long relationships. And I've had a couple of shorter relationships

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to hike with my dog, Webster. It helps clear my mind

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: The only real indulgence was buying a house. That was a pretty big step

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: And when I first came out from New York, I hadn't driven in a long time. Now I'm like Joe Speedster

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever you move, I think you lose your history

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I am definitely a dog person. I feel like Webster and I are very much alike

Quote.Author: Calista Flockhart
Quote.QuoteValue: But it kills me, this fascination with celebrities' personal lives

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as I'm concerned, 'whom' is a word that was invented to make everyone sound like a butler

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: I never eat in a restaurant that's over a hundred feet off the ground and won't stand still

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting a tattoo would probably make me cry

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: What interests me is what you might call vernacular writing, writing that connects you to a place

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always a source for humor

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always thought that parallel parking was my main talent

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more disturbed when people expect me to be serious

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: Health food makes me sick

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: The shelf life of the average trade book is somewhere between milk and yogurt

Quote.Author: Calvin Trillin
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're writing, you are robbed of your delivery

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: I started breaking out of my shell in sophomore and junior year

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: If I made a mistake on a piece of content, I'm going to learn from it

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to impress myself when I dress

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a time to impress someone, and then there's a time to make an impression on someone

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the biggest misconceptions that has been thrown out there is the fact that I started on Vine

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: Never in a million years would I imagine Calvin Klein flying me out to my first men's fashion show

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: My goal is to bridge the gap between social media and traditional media

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't own cable, but my TV came with a Netflix button

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to sell a brand without having a face to it

Quote.Author: Cameron Dallas
Quote.QuoteValue: Social media... it's the future for the new generation

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty girl who's a model who doesn't suck as an actress

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Grease is the only cure for a hangover

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: When I go out, I love steak and caviar

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: You haven't partied until you've partied at dawn in complete silence with Buddhist monks

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Your regrets aren't what you did, but what you didn't do. So I take every opportunity

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I did all my heavy partying before I turned sixteen

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been noticing gravity since I was very young

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I eat a cheeseburger with French fries almost every day

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love a family. I'm at the age where the wish for a child gets stronger. But who knows

Quote.Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Image is powerful, but image is also superficial

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Modelling is an incredible platform

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: A ton of little girls I talk to, they want to be actresses or singers or models

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: I work hard, but my modeling career gives my views undeserved attention

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: My last two years of high school, I think I went to Burger King every day for lunch

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Like many young people, I believe I have potential to make a positive impact in the world

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Having a couple really great basics makes it easy to dress well every day

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: The real way I became a model is I won a genetic lottery, and I became the recipient of a legacy

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Mass media wants bright lights. Mass media wants crazy clothes

Quote.Author: Cameron Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite outfit is baggy black corduroy pants and a baggy T-shirt

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the only time that I worry about looking good is on the red carpet

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: The Fourth of July should be celebrated with big hearts

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: We're like a travelling circus... We're always on the go

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm curvy

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is so important

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of times, you think you want something, and then you find something completely different

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: I love ice cream, and I love chocolate

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: This shared love of cooking and celebration has allowed me to create a strong bond with my family

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a hard time finding high boots that go up to your knee, because of the shape of my calves

Quote.Author: Camila Alves
Quote.QuoteValue: In my 20s, I wanted to be hot; now I want to be healthy

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: You see that it is not at all like Rodin... I share these only with you, don't show them

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: You find me at work; excuse the dust on my blouse. I sculpt my marble myself

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: I tolerate my faults but not at all other people's

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had the problem of seeing my male model go to Italy and... stay there

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: Sir Rodin convinced my parents to have me committed; they are all in Paris to arrange it

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been back in Paris for two weeks. Nothing new. Life is still bitter

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to say anything because I know I am unable to protect you from the harm that I see

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: I have all sorts of problems and feel discouraged

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are nice, and keep your promise, we will be in paradise

Quote.Author: Camille Claudel
Quote.QuoteValue: Send me one hundred francs on our future deals, otherwise I will disappear in a cataclysm

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: What is happening with automation and globalization, that's not going away

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Every education law should be based around the question, 'Is this good for children?' And it's not

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not going to see me ever be partisan. I'll never take a position on a candidate or an issue

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: In a situation where it's the child or the adult, I'm going with the child

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no reason why anyone's job should become untouchable for the rest of their life
